mapper.insert: insert into merge_operations (event_ids, confidence, approved, decision_made_by, executed, decision_made_at, taken_to_merge_at) values (#{eventIds, typeHandler=io.kontur.eventapi.typehandler.StringArrayTypeHandler}, #{confidence}, #{approved}, #{decisionMadeBy}, #{executed}, #{decisionMadeAt}, #{takenToMergeAt})
mapper.select: select * from merge_operations where approved and not executed order by decision_made_at asc nulls first
